query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Initial Dissemination and Communities Involvement Strategy and Plans
result.description: This document will detail the plan for the project communication, dissemination and collaboration strategy, which will be periodically refined. It will identify the main stakeholders and influencer groups and will layout the dissemination and communication plan for activities to reach out, communicate, and engage with stakeholders. Will also define the initial plan for collaboration and the objectives and KPIs to be monitored during the project. This deliverable will report about the creation of the website and communication channels and the set of marketing collateral materials, channels and tools such as social media that the consortium will create to promote the project during the first months of project.
